channel.title: I2P-Whonix post install guide
channel.description:
Hi.
I followed the Whonix I2P guide. TOR>I2P. It went well. But what do I do after the install? How do I configure the router settings? Are we supposed to disable IP6 in there? Just not sure on what settings I should be running on the router.
Is there an I2P browser I can install in Whonix so that it is separate from the normal browser?
Thanks

item.title: I2P-Whonix post install guide
